title: Carbon corrosion in low-temperature CO2 electrolysis systems
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3266-3278
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00594E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jack R. Ferrell, Mathew Rasmussen, W. Wilson McNeary
Mitigation of carbon corrosion, or the use of non-carbon based anodes, is required to achieve the necessary durability for industrial CO2 electrolysis.
